Valid SessionId and IPNumber Invalid SessionId or IPNumber Provided IPNumber is valid, proceeding Provided IPNumber is invalid, please provide valid IPNumber Provided IPNumber is not eligible for mobile appointments Provided IPNumber is not available Provided mobile number is not valid
Verification successfully Verification failed, incorrect or expired OTP number provided We encountered error with our server, please try again

Provided IPNumber does not have mandatory IP details, please try again IPNumber has associated dependents Provided IPNumber has valid IP details Your session has expired, please login again
